Sentencas: Steam methane reforming is a very important chemical process in hydrogen production and solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Cooperative activation effect on H2O adsorption in MnO-Co catalyzed steam methane reforming

Sentencas: Cobalt (Co) is an important catalyst for dry and steam methane reforming.
Titulo: Cooperative activation effect on H2O adsorption in MnO-Co catalyzed steam methane reforming

Sentencas: However, previous studies have confirmed that metal Co surfaces only have weak adsorption activity for H2O, which is evidently unfavorable for steam reforming.
Titulo: Cooperative activation effect on H2O adsorption in MnO-Co catalyzed steam methane reforming

Sentencas: In this work we used first-principles simulations to study the activity of MnO-Co catalysts for the adsorption of H2O. Compared with the Co (111) surface and pristine Co clusters, the MnO-Co catalytic layer has a stronger adsorption capability for H2O because of the introduction of the MnO substrate, which is crucial for improving the steam reforming reaction and inhibiting carbon disposition in SOFCs.
Titulo: Cooperative activation effect on H2O adsorption in MnO-Co catalyzed steam methane reforming

Sentencas: The cooperation mechanism between MnO and Co is discussed based on the analysis of electronic structures.
Titulo: Cooperative activation effect on H2O adsorption in MnO-Co catalyzed steam methane reforming

Sentencas: The conclusions from this work are universal for other metal-oxide composite catalyst layers.
Titulo: Cooperative activation effect on H2O adsorption in MnO-Co catalyzed steam methane reforming
Cooperative activation effect on H2O adsorption in MnO-Co catalyzed steam methane reforming
